attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the sale of council houses so our children can rent a home at a fair  rent and not line the pockets of unfair landlords

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/renting/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
